subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: There was a sense of pity in seeing a legend fall so unexpectedly, and appear so helpless, in Spain’s loss to Chile, in which a death knell clanged for most of the game.
snippet: There was a sense of pity in seeing a legend fall so unexpectedly, and appear so helpless, in Spain’s loss to Chile, in which a death knell clanged for most of the game.
